title: Can't downlowd lol
body:
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/ShellInstaller/OC1/LeagueofLegends_OC1_Installer_9_15_2014.exe
The server at l3cdn.riotgames.com can't be found, because the DNS lookup failed. DNS is the network service that translates a website's name to its Internet address. This error is most often caused by having no connection to the Internet or a misconfigured network. It can also be caused by an unresponsive DNS server or a firewall preventing Google Chrome from accessing the network.
Plz Help!!

replies.body: I cant download this game. why

I had this issue last patch. If you already have installed LOL, just leave it for the next few days until RIOT fixes their stuff... It's frustrating and annoying I know... this is why I rarely play league now.. 

whilst I've been playing dota all day.... in league.. when I launch the application, it tells me som RADS error and to check THAT I HAVE INTERNET.. that's funny because I do..  and when you get this error.. per the last patch issue I had.. you can't download the lol application either..

League have gone to sht.s i'm sorry to say.. but their software has totally gone buggy.......(since I started playing this game).. and before anyone could say.. it's my ISP, ROUTER, or my ISP connection to RIOTS server.. ultimately it's RIOTS problem if they want to keep their players to remain playing this game...

For instance.. why of all the game I have played.. this is the only game where I get these kind of issues.... dota doesn't have it.. neither does cod when I used to play it.....

I know RIOT will say.. it's not their problem because the servers are working fine..... but deep down in their configuration THERE IS A PROBLEM.. 

I have the same issue today....

Well,

this %%%%'s only happened after they changed the patcher.

I hate the new patcher because of this.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/I8XUgB8w-rads-error-or-unable-to-connect-to-supportriotgamescom
Found out how to fix it:)
i had the RADS error and tried to re-install and this happened;(
